derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from obsolete fig 'piles' + wort. The word originally denoted the pilewort or lesser celandine, which was used as a treatment for piles; the current sense dates from the late 16th cent

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous tall coarse woodland plants of the genus Scrophularia
